error-message.main: Oops! We are having difficulties loading this page. Please reload it.

error.title: Error 404
error.recherche-intro: We are sorry, the page you have requested no longer exists. You can initiate a search to find the content that interests you…
error.redirection-intro: … or let youself be tempted by a new destination:

current-operations.operations-intro: We're currently running %{total} consultations in your country, join in!
current-operations.operations-intro_1: We're currently running %{total} consultation in your country, join in!
current-operations.countries-intro: You can also have a look at our service in other countries:

maintenance.title: Maintenance in progress
maintenance.explanation-1:
In order to offer you an ever more efficient website
Make.org is currently in maintenance.
maintenance.explanation-2: Please come back in a few minutes.

cookie-alert: By continuing your navigation on our site, you hereby accept the use of cookies providing you with a personalised and smooth experience.

welcome.title: Propose, vote, act
welcome.subtitle: Make.org is an independent initiative in the service of the general public.

article-1.intro: politics are no longer enough, let's move the lines together
article-1.title: Propose, vote, act
article-1.item-1: Vote for the proposals you stand for
article-1.item-2: Submit your ideas on themes that inspire you
article-1.item-3: And tomorrow, initiate concrete actions on the ground

article-2.title: Make.org, neutral & independent
article-2.text: Make.org is a civic, European and independent initiative.

theme-showcase.see-all: See all the topic's proposals about %{themeName}

prompting-to-propose-tile.intro: What about you, what is your proposal?

no-results.intro: We did not find any result for your search.
no-results.prompting-to-propose: Be the first person to formulate a proposal on this subject!

proposal.share-intro: Share this proposal with your community

proposal-s-operation-infos.intro: Cette proposition a √©t√© soumise dans le cadre de l'op√©ration

submit-proposal.error-message: An error has occurred, please try again in a few minutes.

form.proposal-input-placeholder: The proposal should be realistic and respectful of everyone
form.limit-of-chars-reached-alert: Oops! You have exceeded the limit of 140 characters üòÖ Try to be more precise. üôè
form.info: Don't worry, we will correct any spelling mistakes.
form.moderation-charter: To find out more about our moderation charter, click here.

error-message.limit-of-chars-exceeded: You have exceeded the character limit.
error-message.not-enough-chars: Your proposal must contain at least %{min} characters.

authenticate.intro: We need some information to validate your proposal
authenticate.title: To validate your proposal

confirmation.title: Thank you!
confirmation.info:
Your proposal has been taken into consideration, it will now be reviewed by our moderation service.
You will receive an email when it has been validated.

no-political-action.intro: We do not have an action to propose on this topic at the present time, but we are working on it!
no-political-action.text: Come back soon to work together!

results.title: Vote on the proposals
results.no-results:
We did not find any result corresponding to your tag selection.
Please make another selection.

guide.vote:
Use the buttons to vote
and to go to the next proposal.
guide.qualification: If you wish, you can clarify your vote. (Otherwise, go to the next proposal.)

introduction.title: Thousands of citizens are submitting solutions.
introduction.explanation-1: Take a stand on these solutions and offer yours.
introduction.explanation-2: The ones with the most support will determine our actions.

prompting-to-propose.intro: What about you, do you have a solution to propose on this subject?
prompting-to-propose.next-cta: Not yet, I will continue voting

prompting-to-continue.intro: Thank you for your contribution. Continue to be involved with this cause:

notifications.success: Your account has just been activated. You can login now

switch-to-register-screen.intro: I do not have an account,

authenticate.no-account-found: We cannot find an account associated with this email.
authenticate.no-email-found: Oops! We are unable to get you connected. Please try again with a valid email.
authenticate.error-message: Something did not work. If the problem persists, do not hesitate to contact us at contact@make.org

recover-password.title: I am resetting my password
recover-password.info: Please enter the email address associated with your account in order to receive the reset link

error-message.mail-not-found: We cannot find an account associated with this email.

success.title: Thank you, your password has been updated.

failure.title: This link is no longer valid.

notifications.error-message: Your password could not be changed

register.caution: (Rest assured, nothing will be published without your consent.)
register.with-email-intro: I am registering with my email address
register.terms: By registering, you agree to our terms of use and to occasionally receive emails from Make.org.

error-message.already-exists: This account already exists, thank you for logging in.

notifications.success: Your account has been successfully created. Remember to confirm your email address using the link sent to you - to ensure the account is yours.

login.with-email-intro: I am logging in with my email address
